title: Smart Scan - DTCs

body.body: Clicking the Read DTCs button in the top navigation menu will display the Read DTCs page.

body.name: Smart Scan - DTCs Page - DTCs Stored

body.body: From this page it is possible to read and erase DTCs from all motorcycle ECMs. It is also possible to generate and save a PDF DTC report for your motorcycle.
The landing page provides details of the connected motorcycle, and a list of ECMs from the motorcycle that can store DTCs.
The ECMs listed are colour coded based on the presence of stored DTCs:
The number of stored DTCs is also displayed on each ECM banner.
Click on an ECM to expand it and view details of stored DTCs.

body.name: Smart Scan - DTCs Page - DTCs Stored - Expanded

body.body: Each ECM listed is provided with a toggle switch. The toggle switches are automatically set to Off or On positions, based on the presence of stored DTCs:
No DTCs (Green) - Toggle switch Off (left) position - Do not erase.
DTCs Stored (Amber) - Toggle switch On (right) position - Erase DTCs.
The toggle switches can be adjusted to allow you to choose which ECMs you wish to erase DTCs from.
When you have selected the ECMs you wish to erase DTCs from, click
The Erase DTCs Confirmation screen is displayed.
The screen will show the progress of the erase process for each ECM.
The Current Status bar will be coloured Amber while the erase is in progress, and the message ERASE DTCS IN PROGRESS will be displayed.

body.name: Smart Scan - Erase DTCs - In Progress

body.body: When the erase process is complete, the Current Status bar will change to green, and the message ERASE DTCS COMPLETE will be displayed.

When the process is complete, click
to continue. The tool will rescan each ECM for stored DTCs and update the Model DTC Status display.
If all DTCs are successfully erased, all ECMs will be coloured Green.
The Model Status Summary shown on the Summary page will also be updated after erasing or re-scanning DTCs

body.name: Smart Scan - DTCs Page - No DTCs

body.body: A PDF report of the motorcycle's stored DTCs can be saved for viewing or printing. Click

body.name: Smart Scan - DTCs - Save to PDF

body.body: The PDF file name is automatically generated in the following naming format:
DTC - DATE - TIME - VIN. For example; DTC 2022.06.15 - 11.47.05 (SMTTC338DDT000000).
Click Save to save the report.
The saved report will automatically open in your PDF reader or browser.
Saved reports can be accessed from the REPORTS menu. See Reports.

The Model Status Summary shown on the Summary page will also be updated after erasing or re-scanning DTCs

search: Smart Scan - DTCs
Clicking the Read DTCs button in the top navigation menu will display the Read DTCs page.
From this page it is possible to read and erase DTCs from all motorcycle ECMs. It is also possible to generate and save a PDF DTC report for your motorcycle.
Reading DTCs
The landing page provides details of the connected motorcycle, and a list of ECMs from the motorcycle that can store DTCs.
The ECMs listed are colour coded based on the presence of stored DTCs:
Green - No DTCs
Amber - DTCs Stored.
The number of stored DTCs is also displayed on each ECM banner.
Click on an ECM to expand it and view details of stored DTCs.
Erasing DTCs
Each ECM listed is provided with a toggle switch. The toggle switches are automatically set to Off or On positions, based on the presence of stored DTCs:
No DTCs (Green) - Toggle switch Off (left) position - Do not erase.
DTCs Stored (Amber) - Toggle switch On (right) position - Erase DTCs.
The toggle switches can be adjusted to allow you to choose which ECMs you wish to erase DTCs from.
When you have selected the ECMs you wish to erase DTCs from, click
ERASE DTCs
The Erase DTCs Confirmation screen is displayed.
Click
START
to start erasing DTCs.
The screen will show the progress of the erase process for each ECM.
The Current Status bar will be coloured Amber while the erase is in progress, and the message ERASE DTCS IN PROGRESS will be displayed.
When the erase process is complete, the Current Status bar will change to green, and the message ERASE DTCS COMPLETE will be displayed.
The
ERASE DTCS
button at the bottom left of the screen is provided to allow you to restart the DTC erase if any errors occur during the initial attempt.
When the process is complete, click
NEXT
to continue. The tool will rescan each ECM for stored DTCs and update the Model DTC Status display.
If all DTCs are successfully erased, all ECMs will be coloured Green.
The Model Status Summary shown on the Summary page will also be updated after erasing or re-scanning DTCs
DTC PDF Report
A PDF report of the motorcycle's stored DTCs can be saved for viewing or printing. Click
SAVE TO PDF
to save a DTC Report.
The PDF file name is automatically generated in the following naming format:
DTC - DATE - TIME - VIN. For example; DTC 2022.06.15 - 11.47.05 (SMTTC338DDT000000).
Click Save to save the report.
The saved report will automatically open in your PDF reader or browser.
Saved reports can be accessed from the REPORTS menu. See Reports.
Rescan DTCs
Click the
RESCAN DTCs
button to rescan each ECM for stored DTCs and refresh the motorcycle DTCs readout.
The Model Status Summary shown on the Summary page will also be updated after erasing or re-scanning DTCs
